revised_title: George William Series: A Pioneering Optical Spectroscopist
tldr: George William Series was a renowned optical spectroscopist who made significant contributions to the fields of atomic physics, quantum mechanics, and laser technology. His research focused on the fine and hyperfine structures of hydrogen, deuterium, and ions of the light isotope of helium, using novel techniques and tuneable lasers. Series' work laid the foundation for advancements in optical spectroscopy and its applications.
